{"id":554976534,"lang":"cpp","time":"11 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1631650993,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"23 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/554976534/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Roman to Integer","memory":"8.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int romanToInt(string s) {\n        map <char ,int> m ;\n        m['I'] =1;\n        m['V'] = 5 ;\n        m['X'] = 10 ;\n        m['L'] = 50;\n        m['C'] = 100;\n        m['D'] = 500;\n        m['M'] = 1000;\n        \n        int sum =0 ;\n        int i = 0;\n        while(i<s.size()){\n           char firstCharacter = s[i];\n           int  firstNumberValue = m[firstCharacter];\n          // cout<<\"i is \"<<i <<endl;\n          // cout<<\"firstNumberValue is \"<<firstNumberValue <<endl; \n           int secondNumberValue=0;\n           if(i+1 < s.size()){\n               char secondCharacter = s[i+1];\n               secondNumberValue = m[secondCharacter];\n            //   cout<<\"condition true\"<<endl;\n              // cout<<\"secondNumberValue \"<<secondNumberValue <<endl;\n           }\n            //cout<<\"both ....\"<<firstNumberValue << \" \"<<secondNumberValue <<endl;\n            if(firstNumberValue < secondNumberValue){\n              //  cout<<\"excuted\"<<endl;\n                sum += (secondNumberValue- firstNumberValue);\n                i = i+2;\n            }\n            else{\n                sum +=firstNumberValue;\n                i++;\n            }\n            \n            \n        }\n        return sum ;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"roman-to-integer"}
